responses: Hi there, what can I do for you?

patterns: What kinds of bikes do you rent?
responses: We rent road , mountain, folding and hybrid bicycles.
We have road / mountain/ folding/ hybrid bicycles.
We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal.
We accept most major credit cards, and Paypal.

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
responses: Yes, we do provide delivery for a flat rate of $10. You are also able to self collect at the nearest branch near you for free.
Yes, we do provide delivery for a flat rate of $10. You are also able to self collect at the nearest branch near you.

patterns: How much does rental for each bikes cost?
responses:
Our charges are: 
Road bike - $9/hr
Mountain bike - $10/hr 
Folding bike - $10/hr
Hybrid bike - $11/hr
